title: Insurance Code
context: [ยง431:9A-159] Advertising. (a) A course shall not be advertised as an approved course for continuing education credit unless the commissioner has approved the course in writing. (b) Advertisements for an approved course shall include: (1) The provider&rsquo;s name, course title, and course number; (2) The statement &ldquo;Approved by the Hawaii State Insurance Commissioner for continuing education credit&rdquo;; (3) The number of approved credit hours; and (4) The amount of tuition, fees, and all other associated expenses. [L 2003, c 55, pt of ยง1]
